app_description: Metaslip is a minimalist note taking software that focuses on the Zettelkasten dedicated to helping users think deeply. Features Privacy first no network required data stored locally. Data portability can be exported as a universal Markdown file and SQLite database at any time. Robust data backup mechanism supports manual export import WebDAV and iCloud Pro . Supports Markdown format including LaTeX mathematical formulas. Supports bidirectional linking and parent child linking. Supports card management by tags and projects. Deep optimization for Zettelkasten.
